title: Rescue the Druid Halsin
content:
[LOLTH-DWORN] I don't have the most trustworthy face.

Choosing dialogue 2 will reveal Minthara's plan in the Grove, and speaks about the Absolute. You will have the following dialogue options.

I've done enough. The battle is yours to fight. It shall be so. No. This ends now, and so do you.

Choosing dialogue 2 will gain the approval of Astarion, and the disapproval of Gale. Monthara will also be pleased with you. Minthara trusts you and ends the conversation. She will walk onto the wooden brid
